aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.discription: Hello, I am a frontend developer based in Düsseldorf. With a deep passion for the endless possibilities in IT, I enjoy creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites and applications.
aboutMe.subDiscription1: I am adaptable when it comes to work environments, capable of working effectively both on-site in Düsseldorf and remotely.
aboutMe.subDiscription2: I am open-minded and constantly seek personal challenges to push my knowledge and skills to new heights.
aboutMe.subDiscription3: For me, programming goes beyond just writing code; it’s a creative problem-solving process. I take pride in breaking down complex technical problems into clear, intuitive solutions, making it easier for you.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.experience: I have accumulated experience in developing projects using various frontend technologies and design concepts.
skills.contactMessage: Don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm excited to build on my existing expertise and learn more.

portfolio.subtitle: Discover a curated collection of my projects - Engage with them to experience my skills firsthand.
portfolio.joinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.elPolloLocoDescription: Jump-and-run game that combines fun gameplay with advanced game logic, built using object-oriented programming.
portfolio.pokedexDescription: Pokédex app that fetches Pokémon data from an API. View detailed information about each Pokémon, including stats, abilities, and evolutions.

references.Michael: I worked with Marc on a frontend project. He was always well-organized, and I appreciated his clear communication and solution-oriented approach.
references.Julia: She was very detail-oriented and had great ideas for improving the user experience.
references.Thomas: I appreciate his efficiency and reliability. He quickly adapted to new challenges.
